Text: Don't know what's worse - the scan of the comic or the content in it...and it's the same like issue 5,bunch of JPGs that aren't even numbered properly.But thanks anyway

Thanks man. A piece of advice : Zip all these pics into a rar file and rename the extension to .cbr. Also you'll need to number pics like 01, 02...to maintain the order. Its much easier for the readers. Cheers :)

do what GH said, and your ul's will be awesome :-)

thanks for the ul :-)
